price: 31 Retournez donc à Allah, redoutez Sa colère et observez la prière. Ne soyez pas de ces idolâtres
arabic: ۞ مُنِيبِينَ إِلَيۡهِ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَلَا تَكُونُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: munībīna ilayhi wa-ittaqūhu wa-aqīmū al-ṣalata walā takūnū mina al-mush'rikīna
